abstract: Luis Ernesto Michel Vergara (born July 21, 1979) is a Mexican football goalkeeper who currently plays for Deportivo Saprissa, on loan from Guadalajara. Michel has captained both Guadalajara and the Mexico national team in official matches, captaining the latter in the 2011 Copa América.
